npcSpeech.text: It's a great day to be sliding around.
Yes, of course, who did you expect?
Ah something important to tell you. See those holes in the ground? Very dangerous. Don't fall inside!
The holes! Can't you see them?
Why!? Eh... ehm... I'm not! Well I am but it's just because we keep bumping into each other so fortunately...
I don't think he'd be very happy about about that...
Who... What. WHERE. WHEN HOW! I keep six honest serving-men, (They taught me all I knew); Their names are What and Why and When and How and Where and Who.
Oh I shouldn't have said that. Remember what I said about those holes!
Keep your eye on the rocks in front of you and travel steadily.
